name: Instances
author: kafeijao
description:
__**Features**__:
- Rejoin the last instance when restarting the game.
- When rejoining teleport to the previous location.
- When starting the game, join on an online Instance of the Home world.
- Keep the joined Instances History and allow to rejoin them.
- Restart the game via button.

You can toggle the joining last instance, or/and starting in an online instance, rejoining last Instance takes priority. Also you can configure the online instance region and privacy type.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/Instances) for more in-depth info.

**Optional Requirements**
- [ChatBox](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/168)
